title: How to Negotiate Your Medical Bills and Debt With Your Hospital
sub_head: Medical bills can be hard to decipher but there are several reasons to pause before you settle up
body:
American households commonly struggle with medical bills, federal and consumer surveys show, often leading to lingering debt. Unpaid bills can drag down credit scores and prompt some people to delay care to avoid more debt.
Managing the bills can be daunting. Hospital bills and insurance statements are complicated and sometimes at odds. But you may be able to slash the amount you owe by questioning your bills, negotiating with hospitals and pressing for financial aid.
